roleset.name: (causing to) be warm

example.name: arg1
example.text: * insists that global warming is a gigantic hoax -LRB- yes , Rush Limbaugh knows more about global climate science than NASA ;
Another inconvenient fact for the man made global warming crowd . Since 1998 until today there has been no significant warming .
example.note: This sort of feels weird as an arg0, but since that is the information ultimately being given, that's what we're going with.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, warm.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4.
